Cause Affliction: Curse
 
(Affects Sacreds Only [sacredonly], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The unholy priest curses an enemy priest or a small group of holy enemy units. The cursed ones have a greatly increased chance of obtaining permanent afflictions if they are wounded.
